name: Nocs Provisions Zoom Tube 8x32 Monocular, 8X Magnification Telescope, Bak4 Prism, Wide Field of View for Bird Watching, Backpacking & Wildlife Viewing - Indigo Blue II
short_description: ULTRA PORTABLE DESIGN: The Zoom Tube is a super lightweight, compact, ultra-portable monocular (weight: 9.5 oz.) featuring Fully Multi Coated optics, a central focusing system, and Swiss-designed Bak4p prism for a bright field of view (384ft @ 1000yds) wherever you go. Scratch-proof and water-resistant, this rugged monocular is designed to go anywhere to provide bright crisp views for birdwatching, hiking, camping, wildlife viewing, and traveling.

FULLY-MULTI COATED OPTICS: Optimal clarity and brightness from unique lens coating formula; each piece layered in anti-reflective coating with a low refractory index with each surface coated with multiple layers, for a crisp, bright image, and supreme color clarity to the edge of the field of view. Designed to accommodate smartphone photography and videography, simply just line up your smartphone to snap a picture, capture the moment, and share.
WATER-RESISTANT: The IPX4 ingress protection rating means you can take the Zoom Tube out in any weather: rain, fog, and snow; it’s engineered to keep up in the field.

FEATURES: Multi-stop twist up eyecup mechanism provides three distinct positions to optimize the viewing experience, ideal for eyeglass wearers and the naked eye. Patented ergonomic Rugged Wave Grip design ensures no slip in palm, a comfortable feel in hand, and impact resistant housing to protect the optimal system. 1/4” 20 threaded tripod adapter engineered into the frame, the Zoom Tube can be mounted on a tripod for steady viewing.

NOCS PROVISIONS: Designing modern, compact, waterproof adventure-ready binoculars with best-in-class optics to inspire the next generations to unplug and find deep connection, and interconnectedness to nature and our planet. 1% For the Planet. “No-Matter-What” Lifetime Warranty – encourages you to get out there and roam with confidence.

name: Monocular Telescope with Smartphone Holder & Upgraded Tripod, 2025 BAK4 Prism FMC Monoculars for Adults, 40X Magnification Telescope, Wide Field of View for Bird Watching, Backpacking
short_description: Sharp, Bright Images Every Time: With BAK4 prisms and FMC lenses, this 40x60 monocular maximizes light intake and reduces reflections, producing clear, high-contrast visuals in various lighting. From bird feathers to distant stage performances, it captures details you’d miss with the naked eye.

Capture Memories with Your Phone: The included phone holder and tripod let you easily attach your device, turning distant views into shareable photos and videos. Fast focusing and stable support ensure blur-free shots, perfect for documenting travel, hiking, or family outings.

Portable Enough for Any Adventure: At just 13.76oz and compact in size, it’s easy to carry in a backpack or pocket. The wrist strap adds security, and the velvet bag protects it from bumps—ideal for camping, stargazing, hunting, or watching races.

Tough Against the Elements: Nitrogen filling and O-ring seals make it dustproof, fogproof, and splash-resistant, performing well in rain, mist, or dusty environments. The durable tripod adjusts to different heights, and the scratch-resistant lenses ensure it stays in top shape for years.

Hassle-Free to Use & Maintain: Dual focusing controls let you quickly get a clear view, even if you wear glasses. The simple setup means you can start using it right away, and the included cleaning tools make maintenance a breeze. A 30-day return policy adds extra peace of mind.
